contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Crafted of premium top-grain leather with 100% linen reverse, our pillow cover is super rich and smooth.  With its classic design and luxe materials, this pillow will instantly elevate any space.
contentfulProduct.title: Luxe Leather Pillow Cover

content.value: Buy any 4 decorative pillow covers - save 15%

Crafted of premium top-grain leather with 100% linen reverse, our pillow cover is super rich and smooth. With its classic design and luxe materials, this pillow will instantly elevate any space. Mix and match with our other pillow covers for the perfectly curated look.
Front: 100% top-grain leather
Reverse: 100% linen in flax color
Due to the natural quality of leather, each pillow is one-of-a-kind and will have variations in color and markings
Leather softens and only gets better over time
Zipper closure
Insert not included
Crafted in India
When dirty, give it a quick wipe with a soft dry cloth; with it you can use some leather cleansing cream or a small amount of water; let water spills dry naturally.

productDetails.productDetails:
• Front: 100% top-grain leather
  • Reverse: 100% linen in flax color
  • Due to the natural quality of leather, each pillow is one-of-a-kind and will have variations in color and markings
  • Leather softens and only gets better over time
  • 20''x20''
  • Zipper closure
  • Insert not included
  • Crafted in India
